title: Behind the Smoke Curtain (2013) - DIVX 1280x720
description:
Barbara Honegger's presentation "Behind the Smoke Curtain" explains what happened at the Pentagon on 9/11, and what didn't, and why it matters.

Filmed in Seattle, January 12, 2013 at Town Hall Theater.
